name: Alexa's Basket
loreDescription: A basket Alexa carries whenever she goes on a picnic with someone she wishes to become close to, containing everything necessary for a nice lunch in a beautiful forest. Just taking it along will elicit the joy of a pleasant picnic outing.

skillDescription.base: 20.0% chance each to grant increased Attack and Critical Hit Chance to the caster for 1 turn at the end of the turn.
skillDescription.max: 40.0% chance each to grant increased Attack and Critical Hit Chance to the caster for 1 turn at the end of the turn.
